Paragraph: The stronger ICT within PzNDTDTBO is originated from a relatively stronger electron - withdrawing nature of BO unit compared to that of the BT one.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ICT within PzNDTDTBO |
| BO unit |
| BT unit |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ICT within PzNDTDTBO |
| BO unit |
| BT unit |

Explanation:

* ICT (Ion Conduction Technology) is a property or technology, but the paragraph mentions it as being present within a specific material (PzNDTDTBO), so it is considered a material name in this context.
* BO unit and BT unit are clearly identified as different materials or units within the material name PzNDTDTBO.
